item.title: GPT-5.2 正式发布，狙击 Google Gemini 3
item.guid: GPT-5.2-正式发布，狙击-Google-Gemini-3
item.description:
Early this morning, OpenAI officially released the GPT-5.2 series models, available to ChatGPT paid users and developers via API. It comes in three versions: Instant, Thinking, and Pro, positioned as more reliable production-grade models. 今天凌晨，OpenAI 正式发布 GPT-5.2 系列模型，面向 ChatGPT 付费用户与开发者 API，分为 Instant、Thinking、Pro 三个版本，定位为更可靠的生产级模型。

    Instant Version: Emphasizes low latency and high responsiveness, suitable for routine tasks such as information retrieval, document translation, and basic writing.

    Thinking Version: Focuses on programming, long document analysis, mathematical reasoning, and project planning, positioned as an intelligent assistant for complex enterprise-level scenarios.

    Pro Version: Geared towards scientific research, finance, and high-difficulty tasks, emphasizing extreme accuracy and reliability, dubbed the "capability ceiling."

In terms of technical performance, GPT-5.2 shows significant improvements in programming capabilities, mathematical and scientific computing, factual accuracy, and multimodal processing. It can directly generate tables, create PPTs, and write multilingual code, further solidifying its position as a productivity tool in professional scenarios. 在技术性能方面，GPT-5.2 在编程能力、数学与科学计算、事实准确性以及多模态处理上均有显著提升，能够直接生成表格、制作 PPT、编写多语言代码，进一步强化其在专业场景中的生产力定位。

Concurrently, OpenAI announced plans to launch an adult mode in the first quarter of 2026 and update its knowledge base to August 2025 to ensure the timeliness and accuracy of information. 同时，OpenAI 宣布计划在 2026 年第一季度上线成人模式，并将知识库更新至 2025 年 8 月，以保证信息的时效性与准确性。

Previously, facing competition from Google Gemini 3, OpenAI CEO Altman had already initiated a "red alert" within the company. 此前，面对 Google Gemini 3 的竞争，OpenAI CEO 奥特曼已在公司内部开启「红色警报」。

He admitted that Google's success in pre-training has narrowed the gap between the two sides and may bring economic pressure. To this end, OpenAI is adjusting its strategy, temporarily slowing down its AGI goals, and fully focusing on improving ChatGPT's quality to cope with the competition. 他承认，Google 在预训练方面的成功已缩小了双方差距，并可能带来经济压力。为此，OpenAI 正在调整战略，暂时放缓 AGI 目标，全力提升 ChatGPT 的质量，以应对竞争。

Altman said in an interview with CNBC on Thursday local time that Google's "Gemini 3" had less impact on the company's metrics than expected, and predicted that OpenAI would exit "red alert" in January. 奥特曼当地时间周四在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，Google 的「Gemini 3」对公司指标的影响低于预期，并预计 OpenAI 将在 1 月退出「红色警报」。

Fidji Simo, CEO of OpenAI's application business, stated that this release was not driven by this week's competition, but rather the result of several months of integrated development. OpenAI 应用业务 CEO Fidji Simo 称，此次发布并非因本周竞争驱动，而是经多月整合推进的成果。

GPT-5.2 is now gradually rolling out in ChatGPT, prioritizing paid users; GPT-5.1 will remain in the "traditional model" option for three months before being retired. The API is also open, with a higher price than GPT-5.1, but due to improved token efficiency, the total cost is expected to be lower. GPT-5.2 现已在 ChatGPT 陆续开放并优先覆盖付费用户；GPT-5.1 将在「传统模型」选项中保留三个月后下线。API 同步开放，价格较 GPT-5.1 更高，但因 token 效率提升，总成本预期更低。

Today, OpenAI also reached a three-year licensing agreement with Disney. Users can generate social videos featuring over 200 characters from Disney, Marvel, Pixar, Star Wars, and more, with some generated videos also playable on Disney+. 今天，OpenAI 还与迪士尼达成了三年授权协议。用户可以生成包含迪士尼、漫威、皮克斯和星球大战等 200 多个角色的社交视频，部分生成视频还可在 Disney+ 上播放。

In exchange, Disney invested $1 billion in OpenAI and will become an important client for the latter. 作为交换，迪士尼向 OpenAI 投资 10 亿美元，并将成为后者的重要客户。

item.title: 小米武汉智能家电工厂竣工投产，最快 6.5 秒下线一台空调
item.guid: 小米武汉智能家电工厂竣工投产，最快-6.5-秒下线一台空调
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi announced that the first phase of its first large home appliance factory, the Wuhan Xiaomi Smart Home Appliance Factory, has been officially completed and put into operation. 昨天，小米宣布其首座大家电工厂 —— 武汉小米智能家电工厂一期正式竣工并投产。

Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, stated that this factory is an important milestone in Xiaomi's technology and home appliance strategy, and also the third large-scale intelligent manufacturing base under Xiaomi's "Human-Car-Home Full Ecosystem" strategy, following the Xiaomi Smartphone Smart Factory and the Automobile Super Factory. 小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰表示，这座工厂是小米科技家电战略的重要里程碑，也是继小米手机智能工厂、汽车超级工厂之后，小米「人车家全生态」战略下的第三座大型智能制造基地。

According to reports, the core highlights of the Wuhan factory lie in "high intelligence, high quality, and high efficiency." In terms of quality, the factory introduces AI visual quality inspection, achieving 100% detection of key components, with manufacturing tolerance controlled at ±0.05 mm , far exceeding the manual sampling methods of traditional factories. 据介绍，武汉工厂的核心亮点在于「高智高质高效」。在品质方面，工厂引入 AI 视觉质检，实现关键零部件 100% 检测， 制造公差控制在 ±0.05 mm ，远超传统工厂的人工抽检方式。

In terms of automation, the injection molding workshop and sheet metal workshop have achieved 100% automated production, requiring no manual intervention, with a Mijia air conditioner rolling off the line as fast as every 6.5 seconds. 在自动化方面，注塑车间和钣金车间实现了 100% 自动化生产， 无需人工干预，最快每 6.5 秒即可下线一台米家空调。

Lu Weibing emphasized that the commissioning of the Wuhan factory means that Xiaomi now possesses a full-process closed-loop capability in the home appliance sector, encompassing "design-R&D-production-sales-service." The upcoming first self-produced product, the "Mijia Central Air Conditioner Pro Dual Fan," will also mark a new beginning for this transformation. 卢伟冰强调，武汉工厂的投产，意味着小米在家电领域已具备「设计—研发—生产—销售—服务」全流程闭环能力，即将发布的首款自产产品「米家中央空调 Pro 双风轮」也将成为这一蜕变的新起点。

item.title: 马斯克点赞腾讯游戏：他们的品味非常好
item.guid: 马斯克点赞腾讯游戏：他们的品味非常好
item.description:
Recently, former "World of Warcraft" producer Mark Kern stated on X that Tencent's gaming revenue outside of China has surpassed that of EA, Roblox, and GTA. 近日，前《魔兽世界》制作人 Mark Kern 在 X 上表示，腾讯在中国以外的游戏收入规模已超过 EA、Roblox 与 GTA。

He emphasized that when Tencent acquires and supports studios, it usually maintains their independence, refraining from forcibly transforming them into "Tencent studios," but rather promotes their development through resources and financial support. 他强调，腾讯在并购与支持工作室时，通常保持其独立性，不会强行改造为「腾讯工作室」，而是通过资源与资金支持推动发展。

Notably, Tesla CEO Elon Musk replied to the post, stating: "They (Tencent) have very good taste." This brief comment quickly drew attention from the industry and players. 值得注意的是，特斯拉 CEO 埃隆・马斯克回复了该帖子，他表示：「他们（腾讯）的品味非常好」。这一简短评价迅速引发行业与玩家关注。

In recent years, Tencent has continuously increased its investment in overseas markets, forming an "evergreen" content ecosystem with a portfolio of works such as "Path of Exile," "Dune: Awakening," and "Dying Light: The Beast." Musk's evaluation, to some extent, endorses this strategy, highlighting its influence in the global technology and gaming industries. 腾讯近年来在海外市场持续加码，凭借《放逐之路》《沙丘：觉醒》《消逝的光芒：困兽》等作品组合，形成「常青型」内容生态。马斯克的评价在一定程度上为这一战略背书，凸显其在全球科技与游戏产业的影响力。

item.title: iPad 12 或搭载 iPhone 17 同款 A19 芯片，打破多年惯例
item.guid: iPad-12-或搭载-iPhone-17-同款-A19-芯片，打破多年惯例
item.description:
According to MacRumors, Apple is considering using the same A19 chip as the iPhone 17 for the entry-level iPad 12, expected to be released in early 2026. This would break Apple's tradition of using A-series chips one to two generations behind for its entry-level iPads. 据 MacRumors 报道，苹果正在考虑为预计 2026 年初发布的入门级 iPad 12 采用与 iPhone 17 同款的 A19 芯片，这将打破苹果在入门款 iPad 上沿用落后一至两代 A 系列芯片的惯例。

Previously, the iPad 11 (March 2025) was equipped with the A16 chip, first released in 2022 with the iPhone 14, while the earlier iPad 10 (October 2022) used the A14, and the iPad 9 (September 2021) used the A13, all maintaining a generational gap with the iPhone chips of their respective years. 此前，iPad 11（2025 年 3 月）搭载的是 2022 年首发于 iPhone 14 的 A16 芯片，而更早的 iPad 10（2022 年 10 月）使用 A14，iPad 9（2021 年 9 月）使用 A13，均与当年 iPhone 芯片保持代际差距。

The A19 chip is based on TSMC's N3P process, features a "2 performance cores + 6 efficiency cores" architecture, supports hardware-level ray tracing, and is equipped with a 16-core Neural Engine, capable of running large models with "7 billion parameters" locally. If brought to the iPad 12, it will significantly enhance graphics performance and on-device AI capabilities. A19 芯片基于台积电 N3P 工艺，采用「2 性能核 + 6 能效核」架构，支持硬件级光线追踪，并配备 16 核神经引擎，可在本地运行「70 亿参数」大模型。若下放至 iPad 12，将显著提升图形性能与端侧 AI 能力。

Meanwhile, the report also mentioned that Apple plans to include its self-developed N1 network chip in the iPad 12 and new iPad Air to improve Bluetooth and Wi-Fi power efficiency. 与此同时，报道提到苹果还计划在 iPad 12 与新款 iPad Air 中加入自研的 N1 网络芯片，以改善蓝牙与 Wi‑Fi 能效。

However, discrepancies regarding the codenames still exist. Some leaked information shows the iPad 12's codenames as "J581" and "J588," while "J581" and "J582" had appeared in previous code. 不过，关于代号的分歧仍存。部分泄露信息显示 iPad 12 的代号为「J581」「J588」，而此前代码中出现过「J581」「J582」。

Additionally, there were rumors that the iPad mini would use an A19 chip, but its codenames are 'J510' and 'J511'. These differences indicate that Apple is still adjusting the configurations of unreleased models, and the final plan has room for change. 此外，曾有传闻称 iPad mini 将采用 A19 芯片，但其代号为「J510」「J511」。这些差异表明苹果仍在调整未发布机型的配置，最终方案存在变动空间。

item.title: ChatGPT 登顶 2025 年美国 iPhone 免费应用榜
item.guid: ChatGPT-登顶-2025-年美国-iPhone-免费应用榜
item.description:
According to MacRumors, Apple yesterday announced the most downloaded apps and games on the US App Store for 2025. 据 MacRumors 报道，苹果昨天公布 2025 年美国 App Store 最多下载应用与游戏榜单。

In the iPhone free apps (non-game) list, ChatGPT ranked first, followed by Threads, Google, TikTok, and WhatsApp; Google Gemini became one of only two chatbot apps to make the list, ranking 10th. 在 iPhone 免费应用（非游戏）榜单中，ChatGPT 位列第一，随后为 Threads、Google、TikTok 和 WhatsApp；Google Gemini 成为唯二入榜的聊天机器人应用，位列第 10。

The iPad list shows YouTube as the number one free app, followed by ChatGPT, Netflix, Disney+, and Amazon Prime Video. iPad 榜单显示，YouTube 位居免费应用第一，其后为 ChatGPT、Netflix、Disney+、Amazon Prime Video。

Readhub cited data indicating that ChatGPT, which did not make the top ten in 2023, jumped to 4th place in 2024, and then topped the US iPhone free app list in 2025, showing a significant increase in the penetration of generative AI in daily life. Readhub 援引资料指出，ChatGPT 从 2023 年未进前十，到 2024 年跃居第 4，再到 2025 年登顶美国 iPhone 免费应用榜，显示生成式 AI 在大众日常中的渗透明显提升。

item.title: OPPO 成立智慧产品研发部，聚焦「超级小布」统一入口
item.guid: OPPO-成立智慧产品研发部，聚焦「超级小布」统一入口
item.description:
According to Leifeng.com, OPPO has once again adjusted its organizational structure for its AI strategy, establishing a Smart Product R&D Department to fully integrate the original three core businesses: 'Xiaobu Assistant,' 'Xiaobu Memory,' and 'Xiaobu Suggestions,' to collectively create 'Super Xiaobu'. 据雷峰网报道，OPPO 在 AI 战略上再次进行组织架构调整，成立智慧产品研发部，全面整合原有的「小布助手」「小布记忆」「小布建议」三项核心业务，统一打造「超级小布」。

Insiders revealed that OPPO is one of the few manufacturers that has achieved deep integration between its operating system and AI departments. Long before other brands were still vying for dominance, OPPO had already merged relevant departments, reporting uniformly to the same head. 知情人士透露，OPPO 是少数在操作系统与 AI 部门之间实现深度整合的厂商。早在其他品牌仍在争夺主导权时，OPPO 已将相关部门合并，统一向同一负责人汇报。

This adjustment is coordinated by Jiang Yuchen, Director of ColorOS Smart Product R&D, who founded Waveform Intelligence in 2023. Its main product, 'Wawa Writing,' focuses on long-text generation and was acquired by OPPO in October 2024. 此次调整由 ColorOS 智慧产品研发总监姜昱辰统筹，他曾在 2023 年创立波形智能，主力产品「蛙蛙写作」专注长文本生成，并于 2024 年 10 月被 OPPO 收购。

OPPO announced the establishment of its AI Center in January 2024. The team integrates multiple business segments, including Digital Intelligence Engineering, Software Engineering, and the Research Institute, reporting directly to Liu Zuohu, OPPO Senior Vice President and Chief Product Officer. OPPO 于 2024 年 1 月宣布成立 AI 中心，团队整合了数智工程、软件工程、研究院等多个业务板块，直接向 OPPO 高级副总裁兼首席产品官刘作虎汇报。

Over the past two years, the AI Center has driven the integration of Xiaobu Assistant with DeepSeek, as well as the implementation of features like one-click flash notes. 过去两年，AI 中心推动了小布助手与 DeepSeek 的整合，以及一键闪记等功能的落地。

In a previous interview with iFanr, Chen Xi, Director of Software Design for OPPO ColorOS, also admitted that the challenge for ColorOS on the AI side is integration. 在此前与爱范儿的采访中，OPPO ColorOS 软件设计总监陈希也曾坦言，ColorOS 在 AI 侧的挑战是整合。

He pointed out: 'There are many features in phones, and users don't even know about some of them; they are very fragmented.' 他指出：「手机里功能很多，用户甚至不知道有这些功能，很细碎。」

Chen Xi also shared a detail: his wife once asked him, 'Is there a difference between Xiaobu Assistant, Xiaobu Memory, and Xiaobu Suggestions?' In her view, all these functions are just 'Xiaobu'. 陈希还分享了一个细节：其妻子曾问他「小布助手、小布记忆和小布建议有没有区别？」在她看来，这些功能都只是「小布」。

It is worth noting that Jiang Yuchen stated in a recent public interview that the GUI Agent technology adopted by 'Doubao Phone' is OPPO's fallback solution for covering long-tail scenarios, and the company prefers to achieve ecosystem interconnection through an Agent to Agent approach. This strategic direction is highly consistent with the integration goals of 'Super Xiaobu'. 值得注意的是，姜昱辰在近期公开采访中表示，「豆包手机」采用的 GUI Agent 技术是 OPPO 覆盖长尾场景的兜底方案，公司更倾向通过 Agent to Agent 的方式实现生态互联。这一战略方向与「超级小布」的整合目标高度一致。

item.title: Spotify 推出 AI 生成播放列表功能
item.guid: Spotify-推出-AI-生成播放列表功能
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Spotify is testing a new feature called 'Prompted Playlist,' designed to allow users to generate personalized playlists through natural language prompts. 据 Android Authority 报道，Spotify 正在测试一项名为「Prompted Playlist」的新功能，旨在让用户通过自然语言提示生成个性化播放列表。

The feature is currently in the testing phase, available only to Premium users, supports only English, and has been launched first in New Zealand. 该功能目前处于测试阶段，仅面向 Premium 用户开放，并且仅支持英文，在新西兰率先上线。

The core of 'Prompted Playlist' lies in utilizing the user's complete Spotify listening history, all data from registration to the present, combined with user-input prompts to generate playlists. 「Prompted Playlist」的核心在于利用用户完整的 Spotify 听歌历史，从注册之初到当前的所有数据，结合用户输入的提示词生成播放列表。

For example, users can request 'music from artists I've listened to most in the past decade,' or more complex requests like 'high-energy pop and hip-hop songs suitable for a 30-minute 5K run, gradually transitioning to relaxing cool-down music at the end.' 例如，用户可以要求「过去十年我最常听的歌手的音乐」，或更复杂的需求如「适合 30 分钟 5K 跑步的高能量流行和嘻哈歌曲，最后逐渐过渡到放松的冷却音乐」。

This feature not only provides personalized recommendations but also includes explanations for why each song is recommended. Users can further fine-tune results by editing prompts, and if lacking inspiration, they can choose from preset 'Ideas' prompts for reference. Playlists support daily or weekly automatic refreshing. 该功能不仅提供个性化推荐，还会为每首歌曲附上推荐理由说明。用户可通过编辑提示词进一步微调结果，若缺乏灵感，还可在「Ideas」预设提示中选择参考。播放列表支持每日或每周自动刷新。

Unlike existing AI chatbot-generated music recommendations, 'Prompted Playlist' is directly embedded within the Spotify platform, combining algorithms with user historical data to provide more accurate results. Spotify has not yet announced a global rollout schedule for this feature, but it is expected to gradually expand starting next year. 与现有的 AI 聊天机器人生成音乐推荐不同，「Prompted Playlist」直接嵌入 Spotify 平台，结合算法与用户历史数据，提供更精准的结果。Spotify 尚未公布该功能的全球推广时间表，但有望在明年开始逐步扩展。

item.title: 夸克 AI 眼镜「一机难求」，二手市场价格飙至 6999 元
item.guid: 夸克-AI-眼镜「一机难求」，二手市场价格飙至-6999-元
item.description:
After its release, the market demand for Quark AI glasses far exceeded expectations, with both online and offline channels experiencing a situation where 'it's hard to get one device.' Core suppliers revealed that Quark has added a new assembly production line at the factory, and production capacity is expected to gradually increase starting next week. 夸克 AI 眼镜在发布后市场需求远超预期，线上线下均出现「一机难求」的情况。核心供应商透露，夸克已在工厂新增一条组装产线，产能预计从下周开始逐步释放。

Insiders at Luxshare Precision stated that the Quark team intensively moved into the factory last month, adding new production lines to accelerate shipments. Meng Xiangfeng, founder of Zhige Technology, pointed out that the company is stepping up production of large orders for optical waveguide wafers for Quark AI glasses, and newly purchased equipment has been fully put into use. 立讯内部人士表示，夸克团队上个月已密集进驻工厂，新增产线以加快出货。至格科技创始人孟祥峰则指出，公司正在加紧生产夸克 AI 眼镜的大批光波导片订单，新购设备已全面投入使用。

Quark insiders revealed that the team's main goal is to ensure full production capacity release by January next year to catch the Spring Festival consumption boom. 夸克内部人士透露，团队的主要目标是确保在明年 1 月能够充分释放产能，以赶上春节消费热潮。

In November this year, Quark released a total of six single products across two series, S1 and G1. The S1 series has a minimum price of 3799 yuan, and the G1 series starts at 1899 yuan. This also marks the first time Alibaba's large model 'Qianwen' has moved beyond the screen and into a physical hardware form. 今年 11 月，夸克发布 S1、G1 两个系列共六款单品，其中 S1 系列最低售价为 3799 元，G1 系列起售价为 1899 元。这也是阿里旗下大模型「千问」首次走出屏幕，进入物理硬件形态。

Currently, Quark AI glasses S1 on platforms such as Tmall, Douyin, and JD.com are all in a 'sold out upon listing' state. 目前，天猫、抖音、京东等平台上的夸克 AI 眼镜 S1 均处于「上架即售罄」状态。

On second-hand trading platforms like Xianyu, the spot price has been speculated up to 6999 yuan. Regarding offline channels, multiple partner stores reported no stock available, and new orders generally require waiting for about a month or even 40 days. 在闲鱼等二手交易平台，现货价格最高被炒至 6999 元。线下渠道方面，多家合作门店表示暂无现货，新订单普遍需要等待约一个月甚至 40 天。

item.title: 钉钉新版上线：AI 全面融入沟通与协作
item.guid: 钉钉新版上线：AI-全面融入沟通与协作
item.description:
Yesterday, DingTalk officially announced the release of version 8.1.10. The new version further integrates AI capabilities into product modules such as chat, meeting transcription, and DingTalk A1, aiming to improve efficiency and expression quality for workplace communication and cross-language scenarios. Key updates include: 昨天，钉钉官宣正式发布 8.1.10 版本，新版将 AI 能力进一步融入聊天、会议听记与 DingTalk A1 等产品模块，面向职场沟通与跨语场景提升效率与表达质量。主要更新包括：

    The chat interface adds 'AI Smart Reply,' which can automatically generate high-EQ reply suggestions in various styles and supports secondary editing;

    Introduces 'AI Emoji Reactions' and 'AI Forwarded Message Summary' to improve the efficiency of group chats and message forwarding;

    'AI Transcription' adds a Q&A function, supporting direct questioning and summarization based on meeting content, and strengthens applications in scenarios such as classrooms and interviews;

    The graphic minutes feature is improved, supporting secondary editing and one-click image sharing, facilitating layout and collaboration;

    DingTalk A1 hardware upgrade, providing real-time speech-to-text, multi-language translation, screen projection subtitles, and other functions, suitable for cross-border communication;

    File transfer speed is significantly improved, supporting simultaneous recording and uploading, multi-file merging, and smart editing, enhancing workflow efficiency.

Currently, the new version has been simultaneously pushed to PC and mobile clients, and the new capabilities can be used after upgrading. 目前，PC 与手机端已同步推送新版，升级后即可使用上述新能力。

item.title: Android 17 或将引入原生应用锁
item.guid: Android-17-或将引入原生应用锁
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google is developing a native 'App Lock' feature for Android 17. Related code has appeared in the latest Android Canary 2512 version and is expected to be officially introduced with the next major Android version, but the current feature switch remains disabled. 据 Android Authority 报道，Google 正在为 Android 17 开发原生「应用锁」功能，相关代码已在最新 Android Canary 2512 版本中出现，预计随下一次 Android 大版本正式引入，但当前功能开关仍处于禁用状态。

In terms of specific implementation, the native app lock is exposed to the default launcher via system-level APIs: the new permission 'LOCK_APPS' is only granted to the default launcher with the 'HOME' role and internal system applications. 具体实现方式上，原生应用锁通过系统级 API 暴露给默认启动器：新权限「LOCK_APPS」仅授予拥有「HOME」角色的默认启动器与系统内部应用。

The launcher can call the App Lock activity via the 'SET_APP_LOCK' intent. The system will verify whether the target app has a desktop entry, is not on the system exemption list, and its current lock status, then pop up a 'Lock / Unlock this app' confirmation dialog and provide feedback with a prompt message. 启动器可通过「SET_APP_LOCK」意图调用 App Lock 活动，系统将校验目标应用是否具备桌面入口、是否不在系统豁免清单及当前锁定状态，再弹出「是否锁定 / 解除该应用」确认对话框并以提示消息反馈结果。

item.title: 索尼 PS5 液态金属老化致散热失效，维修技师：与竖放无关
item.guid: 索尼-PS5-液态金属老化致散热失效，维修技师：与竖放无关
item.description:
Recently, repair technician modyfikatorcasper disclosed on X that a PS5 Slim, model CFI-2016, less than a year and a half old, was sent for repair due to 'dry spots' and oxidation on the liquid metal thermal interface material on its APU core. 近日，维修技师 modyfikatorcasper 在 X 披露，一台使用不足一年半、型号为 CFI-2016 的 PS5 Slim 因 APU 核心上的液态金属导热材料出现「干斑」与氧化而进厂维修。

He pointed out that the console had been placed vertically since purchase, indicating that the liquid metal experienced performance degradation over time and temperature cycles, regardless of its orientation. 他指出，该主机自购买以来一直竖直放置，显示液态金属随着时间与温度循环发生性能衰退，且与摆放姿态无关。

The technician stated that this type of failure is not solely caused by vertical placement but rather stems more from the quality of liquid metal application and natural aging under long-term high-temperature cycles, which can lead to a significant decrease in cooling performance, subsequently causing issues such as system overheating and sudden shutdowns. 技师称，这类故障并非仅由竖放引起，更多源于液态金属涂敷质量与长期高温循环下的自然老化，可能导致散热性能显著下降，进而引发系统过热、突然关机等问题。

He further stated that all PS5 models will eventually require disassembly for maintenance. This view is consistent with the increasing number of cases reported by players and the repair community earlier this year. 他进一步表示，所有 PS5 机型最终都将需要拆开维护。这一观点与今年早些时候玩家与维修圈反馈的增多案例一致。

In response to the controversy, Sony has introduced deeper guide grooves and ridge structures in the PS5 Pro and subsequent CFI-2100/2200 and CFI-2116 Slim batches to reduce the risk of liquid metal leakage and dry spots, and optimized the layout of thermal interface materials to improve durability and reliability. 为应对争议，索尼已在 PS5 Pro 与后续 CFI-2100/2200 及 CFI-2116 Slim 批次中引入更深的导流沟槽与脊形结构，以减少液态金属泄漏与干斑风险，并优化热界面材料布局，提升耐用性与可靠性。

item.title: 美国 42 州总检察长联手警告苹果等科技公司 AI 风险
item.guid: 美国-42-州总检察长联手警告苹果等科技公司-AI-风险
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, yesterday the National Association of Attorneys General, joined by attorneys general from 42 states and territories, sent an open letter to 13 tech companies, including Apple, Google, Meta, Microsoft, OpenAI, Anthropic, and xAI, demanding stricter measures to prevent the potential harms of generative AI, especially its impact on minors and vulnerable groups. 据 9to5Mac 报道，昨天美国全国总检察长协会联合 42 个州及地区的总检察长，向包括苹果、Google、Meta、Microsoft、OpenAI、Anthropic、xAI 在内的 13 家科技公司发出公开信，要求采取更严格的措施以防止生成式 AI 带来的潜在危害，尤其是对未成年人和弱势群体的影响。

The 12-page document points out that generative AI software frequently produces "flattering and delusional" outputs, and even exhibits serious problems when interacting with children. 这份长达 12 页的文件指出，生成式 AI 软件频繁出现「谄媚和妄想」输出，甚至在与儿童互动时表现出严重问题。

For example, some chatbots establish inappropriate relationships with minors using adult-like personas, encourage drug use and violence, attack children's self-esteem, and even suggest stopping medication or concealing communication with parents. 例如，部分聊天机器人以成人化人格与未成年人建立不当关系，鼓励吸毒和暴力，攻击儿童自尊，甚至建议停止服药或隐瞒与父母的交流。

These situations have been linked to serious real-world consequences such as suicide, murder, domestic violence, poisoning incidents, and psychiatric hospitalizations. 这些情况已与现实中的自杀、谋杀、家庭暴力、中毒事件以及精神病住院等严重后果相关联。

The open letter was co-signed by attorneys general from states including Alabama, Alaska, New York, California, and Washington. It cites typical cases, including a Canadian man who, after prolonged interaction with ChatGPT, became convinced he had discovered a new mathematical system, and a 14-year-old boy who committed suicide after chatting with Character.AI, whose family is now filing a lawsuit. 这封公开信由阿拉巴马、阿拉斯加、纽约、加州、华盛顿等州的总检察长共同签署，信中列举了典型案例，包括一名加拿大男子因与 ChatGPT 长期互动而坚信自己发现了新数学体系，以及一名 14 岁少年在与 Character.AI 聊天后自杀，其家人正在提起诉讼。

The attorneys general believe that these actions may have violated consumer protection laws, children's online privacy laws, and even touched upon criminal statutes. 总检察长们认为，这些行为可能已违反消费者保护法、儿童在线隐私法，甚至触及刑事法规。

They demand that the relevant companies confirm the implementation of a series of safety measures by January 16, 2026, and arrange meetings with the offices of the state attorneys general. Specific measures include: 他们要求相关公司在 2026 年 1 月 16 日前确认是否落实一系列安全措施，并与各州总检察长办公室安排会议。具体措施包括：

    Develop and enforce policies to prevent "flattering and delusional" outputs

    Conduct rigorous safety testing before release

    Add clear, continuous risk warnings

    Separate revenue optimization from safety decisions

    Assign executives responsibility for AI safety outcomes

    Allow independent audits and child safety impact assessments

    Publish incident logs and response timelines for harmful outputs

    Notify affected users

    Ensure chatbots cannot generate illegal or harmful content for children

    Implement age-appropriate safeguards to restrict minors' access to violent or explicit content

item.title: 麻省理工发表新成果，可显著提升芯片能效
item.guid: 麻省理工发表新成果，可显著提升芯片能效
item.description:
Recently, a research team at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) proposed a new chip manufacturing method that significantly improves microelectronic energy efficiency by stacking multiple layers of active devices on the backside of semiconductor chips. This breakthrough technology is expected to alleviate the power demands of high-energy-consumption applications such as artificial intelligence, deep learning, and computer vision. 近日，麻省理工学院（MIT）的研究团队提出一种全新的芯片制造方法，通过在半导体芯片的背端堆叠多层有源器件，大幅提升微电子能效。这一突破性技术有望缓解人工智能、深度学习和计算机视觉等高能耗应用的电力压力。

Traditional CMOS chips separate logic operations from storage, causing energy loss when data is transferred between them. MIT's new platform directly integrates transistors and memory on the backend, shortening data transfer paths, improving computing speed, and reducing energy consumption. 传统 CMOS 芯片将逻辑运算与存储分离，数据在两者间传输时会造成能量损耗。MIT 的新平台则在背端直接集成晶体管与存储器，缩短数据传输路径，提升计算速度并降低能耗。

Using amorphous indium oxide as a key material, the research team successfully fabricated transistors with a thickness of only about 2 nanometers, and on this basis, integrated ferroelectric hafnium-zirconium oxide to achieve storage transistors of approximately 20 nanometers. 借助非晶氧化铟这一关键材料，研究团队成功制备厚度仅约 2 纳米的晶体管，并在此基础上集成铁电铪锆氧化物，实现约 20 纳米的存储晶体管。

These memory devices exhibit a switching speed of 10 nanoseconds and low-voltage operation, with significantly better energy efficiency than similar products. 这些存储器件展现出 10 纳秒的切换速度和低电压操作，能效显著优于同类产品。

The unique properties of amorphous indium oxide allow for the growth of extremely thin layers at low temperatures of about 150 degrees Celsius without damaging front-end devices. Researchers point out that this platform not only reduces power consumption during computation but also provides an experimental basis for exploring the physical properties of ferroelectric materials. 非晶氧化铟的独特性质允许在约 150 摄氏度的低温下生长极薄层，不会破坏前端器件。研究人员指出，该平台不仅能减少计算过程中的电力消耗，还为探索铁电材料的物理特性提供实验基础。

In the future, the team plans to further improve device performance and achieve deep integration of backend memory and logic in a single circuit. 未来，团队计划进一步提升器件性能，并在单一电路中实现背端存储与逻辑的深度集成。

With the rapid development of computationally intensive tasks such as generative AI, power consumption issues are becoming increasingly prominent. MIT's research provides a potential solution for sustainable computing. The results have been published at the IEEE International Electron Devices Meeting and received support from the Semiconductor Research Corporation (SRC) and Intel. 随着生成式 AI 等计算密集型任务的快速发展，电力消耗问题日益突出。MIT 的研究为可持续计算提供了潜在解决方案。该成果已在 IEEE 国际电子器件会议上发布，并获得半导体研究公司 SRC 与英特尔的支持。

item.title: 💡 比尔·盖茨谈 AI 泡沫：高估值公司不必然是赢家，部分投资或走向「死胡同」
item.guid: 💡-比尔·盖茨谈-AI-泡沫：高估值公司不必然是赢家，部分投资或走向「死胡同」
item.description:
According to CNBC, Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates stated in an interview during Abu Dhabi Finance Week that the current AI industry will become 'super competitive,' and not all highly valued companies will be winners. 据 CNBC 报道，微软联合创始人比尔 · 盖茨在阿布扎比金融周接受采访时表示，当前 AI 行业将变得「超级竞争」，并非所有高估值公司都会成为赢家。

He said AI 'only exists as a bubble in some sense,' and some valuations will decline in the future, but it is a technology that will 'profoundly reshape the world' and will undoubtedly bring long-term value. 他称 AI 「仅在某种意义上存在泡沫」，部分估值未来会下行，但这是一项「深刻重塑世界」的技术，毫无疑问将带来长期价值。

Gates pointed out that there have been valuation cases significantly higher than conventional levels in the market: for example, Palantir and Tesla both have P/E ratios exceeding 200 times, while the average P/E ratio for S&P 500 components is about 25 times. 盖茨指出，市场上出现了明显高于常规水平的估值案例：例如 Palantir 与特斯拉的市盈率均超过 200 倍，而标普 500 成分股的平均市盈率约为 25 倍。

As concerns about a bubble burst intensified, global markets saw a pullback in November. Gates bluntly stated that 'a considerable number of companies are unreasonably valued,' and investors need to be wary of 'dead ends' in the sector. 随着对泡沫破裂的担忧升温，11 月全球市场已出现回落。 盖茨直言，「相当一部分公司的估值并不合理」，投资者需警惕赛道中的「死胡同」。

Beyond risks and competition, Gates emphasized AI's practical role in improvement, especially in the fields of healthcare, education, and agriculture. 在风险与竞争之外，盖茨强调 AI 的现实改善作用，尤其是在医疗、教育与农业领域。

He stated that next year, multiple AI-based global health pilot projects will be advanced, including 'virtual doctors' and multilingual agricultural advisory tools for Africa, with the goal of significantly improving the productivity of smallholder farmers. 他表示，明年将推进多项基于 AI 的全球健康试点，包括「虚拟医生」与面向非洲多语种的农业顾问工具，目标是显著提升小农生产率。

He also mentioned that relevant international commitments have provided financial support for combating polio, and AI tools will play a role in building health systems. 他同时提到，相关国际承诺已为抗击脊髓灰质炎提供资金支持，AI 工具将在健康系统建设中发挥作用。

Previously, in an interview with Business Insider, Gates likened the current AI bubble to the 'dot-com bubble,' arguing that it's not pure speculation like the 17th-century Dutch 'tulip mania,' but rather a valuation divergence accompanying technological change: some companies will succeed, while 'me-too' and 'cash-burning' companies will fall behind. 此前，在接受《商业内幕》采访时，盖茨将当下的 AI 泡沫类比为「互联网泡沫」，认为并非 17 世纪荷兰的「郁金香狂热」式纯投机，而是伴随技术变革下的估值分化：有公司成功，也会有「跟风」与「烧钱」型公司落后。

His core judgment remains that the net value of AI will be extremely high, but factors such as capital expenditure and data center costs will turn some paths into 'dead ends.' 其核心判断依旧是 AI 的净价值将极高，但资本开支与数据中心成本等因素会让部分路径变成「死胡同」。

item.title: Ayaneo 首款手机亮相：致敬 Xperia Play 滑盖掌机设计
item.guid: Ayaneo-首款手机亮相：致敬-Xperia-Play-滑盖掌机设计
item.description:
According to The Verge, retro handheld console manufacturer Ayaneo officially unveiled its first Android phone, the Pocket Play. This device 'pays homage' to the design concept of the 2011 Sony Ericsson Xperia Play, featuring a sliding screen structure and built-in physical game controller buttons. 据 The Verge 报道，复古掌机厂商 Ayaneo 正式公布了旗下首款 Android 手机 Pocket Play。这款设备「致敬」了 2011 年索尼 Ericsson Xperia Play 的设计思路，采用屏幕滑动结构，内置完整的物理游戏手柄按键。

Specifically, the Pocket Play is equipped with a D-pad, ABXY buttons, dual shoulder buttons, and dual circular touchpads, which can be used as virtual joysticks or touchpads, supporting mouse input or simulated joystick operations. 具体来看，Pocket Play 配备方向键、ABXY 按键、双肩键以及双圆形触控板，后者可作为虚拟摇杆或触控板使用，支持鼠标输入或模拟摇杆操作。

The back of the device features dual cameras and an LED flash, while the front retains the earpiece opening. The overall appearance is similar to a regular smartphone, but it transforms into a handheld console after sliding out the control area. 机身背面搭载双摄像头与 LED 闪光灯，正面则保留听筒开孔，整体外观与普通智能手机相似，但在滑出控制区后即可化身掌机。

Ayaneo first confirmed it was developing a phone this summer and teased it in October. Yesterday, the official release included a full design showcase video and images, but hardware specifications such as processor, screen, and storage have not yet been announced, nor has the exact launch date been revealed, only stating 'coming soon.' Ayaneo 于今年夏季首次确认正在研发手机，并于 10 月进行预告。昨天，官方发布了完整设计展示视频与图片，但尚未公布处理器、屏幕、存储等硬件规格，也未透露确切上市时间，仅表示「即将推出」。

Compared to another Xperia Play homage model this year, the Anbernic RG Slide, the Pocket Play has a slimmer and more refined appearance, offering a better daily user experience. The price is expected to be significantly higher than the RG Slide's $189. 与今年另一款 Xperia Play 致敬机型 Anbernic RG Slide 相比，Pocket Play 外观更为纤薄精致，日常使用体验更好。价格预计将远高于 RG Slide 的 189 美元。

Current information shows that Pocket Play offers two color options, black and white, with a body made of glass and aluminum alloy, equipped with stereo speakers and a Type-C port, but no 3.5mm headphone jack. 目前的信息显示，Pocket Play 提供黑白两种配色，机身材质为玻璃与铝合金，配备立体声扬声器与 Type-C 接口，但没有 3.5mm 耳机孔。

item.title: 腾讯 QQ 推出群聊元宝 AI 总结功能
item.guid: 腾讯-QQ-推出群聊元宝-AI-总结功能
item.description:
Tencent QQ announced yesterday that QQ group chat messages officially support the Yuanbao AI summary feature. Users can directly click the AI summary button in the upper right corner of the group chat, and after authorization, they can quickly generate a summary of the group chat content. Tencent emphasized that this feature is only visible to the user themselves, and QQ will not store or use it for other scenarios. 腾讯 QQ 昨天宣布，QQ 群聊消息正式支持元宝 AI 总结功能。用户可直接点击群聊右上角的 AI 总结按钮，授权后即可快速生成群聊内容摘要。 腾讯方面强调，该功能仅对用户本人可见，QQ 不会存储或用于其他场景。

The official statement indicates that AI summary results will be clearly marked as AI-generated, do not represent the platform's views, and are for reference only. The feature covers various group chat scenarios including entertainment, learning, and gaming, allowing users to experience automated summaries in different groups. 官方表示，AI 总结结果会明确标注为 AI 生成，不代表平台观点，仅供参考。功能覆盖范围包括娱乐、学习、游戏等多类群聊场景，用户可在不同群组中体验自动化总结。

It is worth noting that Tencent has recently frequently introduced new features to its QQ products. Recently, the official announcement of the return of the classic QQ version, with PC support for dual-mode switching, allows users to freely adjust the message list and chat window layout. Zhang Jun, Tencent's PR director, stated, "Good things sometimes come full circle." 值得注意的是，腾讯近期在 QQ 产品上频繁引入新功能。近日，官方宣布经典版 QQ 回归，PC 端支持双模式切换，用户可自由调整消息列表和聊天窗口布局。腾讯公司公关总监张军表示，「好，有时候是一种轮回。」

After the new feature was launched, some users on social platforms questioned the promise of it being visible only to themselves, believing it contradicts Tencent's previous statements regarding chat history storage. However, other users believe that AI summaries have practical value in large group chats and can significantly reduce the cost of catching up on conversations. 新功能上线后，部分用户在社交平台对仅自己可见的承诺提出质疑，认为其与腾讯此前关于聊天记录存储的表述存在争议。但也有用户认为，AI 总结在大型群聊中具备实用价值，能够显著降低爬楼成本。

item.title: 阿里通义发布 Qwen3‑Omni‑Flash：全模态流式交互与系统提示全面升级
item.guid: 阿里通义发布-Qwen3‑Omni‑Flash：全模态流式交互与系统提示全面升级
item.description:
Yesterday, Alibaba Cloud's Tongyi officially released a comprehensively upgraded version based on Qwen3-Omni, named "Qwen3-Omni-Flash-2025-12-01". 昨天，阿里通义正式发布基于 Qwen3-Omni 的全面升级版本「Qwen3-Omni-Flash-2025-12-01」。

According to reports, the new model can seamlessly process text, image, audio, and video inputs, and simultaneously generate natural speech and text outputs in a streaming manner, enhancing the overall accuracy and efficiency of multimodal interaction. Specific upgrades are as follows: 据介绍，新模型可无缝处理文本、图像、音频、视频输入，并以流式方式同时生成自然语音与文本输出，整体针对多模态交互的准确性与效率进行增强。具体升级如下：

    Audio and Video Understanding and Execution: Significantly enhances the ability to understand and execute audio and video commands for spoken language scenarios, alleviating the "intelligence degradation" problem in multimodal conversations; improves the stability and coherence of multi-turn audio and video dialogues, making interactions more natural and smooth;

    Controllable System Prompts: Fully open System Prompt customization, allowing fine-grained control over model behavior (e.g., persona style, colloquial preferences, response length, etc.), enhancing controllability and consistency;

    Multilingual Adherence: Supports 119 text languages for interaction, 19 speech recognition languages, and 10 speech synthesis languages, optimizing the previous version's unstable language adherence and ensuring accurate and consistent responses in cross-language scenarios;

    Humanized Speech Generation: Addresses issues of sluggish speech speed and mechanical feel, enhancing adaptive adjustment of speech rate, pauses, and rhythm, making speech expression more natural and vivid;

    Visual and Video Understanding: Achieves progress in multidisciplinary visual question answering and mathematical visual reasoning tasks, with continuous optimization of video semantic understanding and audio-video synchronization capabilities, laying the foundation for real-time video conversations.

The official statement indicates that in the future, they will advance the development of core capabilities such as multi-speaker ASR, video OCR, and active audio-video learning, and strengthen support for agent-based workflows and function calls to further enhance controllability and execution in complex scenarios. 官方表示，后续将推进多说话人 ASR、视频 OCR、音视频主动学习等核心能力建设，并强化基于智能体的工作流与函数调用支持，以进一步提升复杂场景下的可控性与执行力。

item.title: Adobe 应用登陆 ChatGPT，一句话即可调用
item.guid: Adobe-应用登陆-ChatGPT，一句话即可调用
item.description:
Recently, Adobe announced the integration of Photoshop, Adobe Express, and Acrobat into ChatGPT, allowing users to perform image editing, design creation, and PDF processing through natural language within conversations. This feature is now freely available to ChatGPT users. 近日，Adobe 宣布在 ChatGPT 中集成 Photoshop、Adobe Express 与 Acrobat，用户可通过自然语言在对话中完成图片编辑、设计创作及 PDF 处理，已免费面向 ChatGPT 用户开放。

The feature supports desktop, web, and iOS; Android currently only supports Adobe Express, with Android support for Photoshop and Acrobat "coming soon". 该功能支持桌面、网页与 iOS；Android 端目前仅支持 Adobe Express，Photoshop 与 Acrobat 的 Android 支持「即将到来」。

Adobe stated that Photoshop in ChatGPT can edit, remove, or blur specific areas of an image, and adjust brightness, contrast, and exposure. Some operations will provide interface elements like sliders for users to fine-tune effects; Adobe 表示，Photoshop 在 ChatGPT 中可对图像特定区域进行编辑、移除或虚化背景，并调整亮度、对比度与曝光，部分操作会提供滑杆等界面元素以便用户微调效果；

Adobe Express supports generating or editing posters, invitations, social media assets, etc., directly in chat, and replacing text, images, color schemes, and animations; Acrobat can merge files, edit or extract PDF text and tables, perform compression and format conversion, and more. Adobe Express 支持直接在聊天中生成或编辑海报、邀请函、社媒素材等，并替换文本、图片、配色与动画；Acrobat 则可合并文件、编辑或提取 PDF 文本与表格、进行压缩与格式转换等。

Users can also switch projects started in ChatGPT directly to native Adobe applications to continue working on more complex tasks. 用户也可将在 ChatGPT 中开启的项目，直接切换至 Adobe 原生应用继续处理更复杂的工作。

Adobe emphasized that this move aligns with OpenAI's third-party application integration ecosystem and is expected to create differentiated competition with rival products like Google's Gemini. Adobe 强调，此举与 OpenAI 的第三方应用集成生态相呼应，并有望与 Google 的 Gemini 等竞争产品形成差异化竞争。

In fact, Adobe is not the first creative tool platform to launch on ChatGPT; design platforms like Canva have already done so. The Verge pointed out that Adobe bringing its Creative Cloud core capabilities to ChatGPT will help improve cross-platform creative production efficiency. 事实上，Adobe 并非首个上线 ChatGPT 的创作工具平台，Canva 等设计平台已在此前上线。The Verge 指出，Adobe 将其 Creative Cloud 核心能力引入 ChatGPT，有助于提升跨平台的创意生产效率。

item.title: 三星官网上架新款 60W 适配器，S26 Ultra 充电速度或迎来升级
item.guid: 三星官网上架新款-60W-适配器，S26-Ultra-充电速度或迎来升级
item.description:
According to SammyGuru, Samsung's official website recently quietly listed a 60W power adapter with model number "EP-T6010". It features a single USB-C interface, a nominal maximum output of 60W (20V/3A), and adopts the latest PD 3.1 PPS fast charging protocol. 据 SammyGuru 报道，三星官网近日悄然上架了一款型号为「EP-T6010」的 60W 电源适配器，单 USB-C 接口，标称最高输出 60 W（20 V/3 A），并采用最新 PD 3.1 PPS 快充协议。

The report points out that this move may suggest that the Galaxy S26 Ultra will upgrade from its previous 45W wired fast charging to 60W. 报道指出，这一举动或暗示 Galaxy S26 Ultra 将从过去的 45W 有线快充升级到 60W。

Information on the official website page shows that this charger can dynamically adjust voltage between 5V and 20V, enabling 60W charging with a common 3A cable, without the need for a dedicated 5A cable. 官网页面信息显示，这款充电器可在 5V–20V 之间动态调压，使用常见 3 A 线即可实现 60W 充电，无需专用 5A 线缆。

At the same time, this charging head has a built-in Smart IC, which can reduce standby power consumption to as low as 5mW when a device is connected but not charging, thereby improving energy efficiency and environmental performance. 同时，该款充电头内置 Smart IC，可在设备连接但未充电时将待机功耗压低至 5mW，以提升能效与环保表现。

Compared to the existing PD 3.0 PPS, the core improvement of PD 3.1 PPS lies in the introduction of Extended Power Range (EPR), supporting up to 240W (48V), and optimizing charging efficiency and safety through more precise 20mV voltage and up to 5A current regulation, making it compatible with more device scenarios. 相较现有的 PD 3.0 PPS，PD 3.1 PPS 的核心改进在于引入扩展供电范围（EPR），最高支持 240W（48V），并通过更精细的 20 mV 电压与最高 5 A 电流调节优化充电效率与安全性，兼容更多设备场景。

In addition, thanks to Qi2, the S26 Ultra's wireless charging is also expected to increase from 15W to 25W, with the new device anticipated to be officially released in the first quarter of 2026. 此外，得益于 Qi2，S26 Ultra 的无线充电也有望从 15W 提升至 25W，新机预计在 2026 年一季度正式发布。

item.title: B 站回应「所有视频都需要会员」传言：不实消息，将追究法律责任
item.guid: B-站回应「所有视频都需要会员」传言：不实消息，将追究法律责任
item.description:
According to Xin Huanghe News, yesterday, a screenshot circulated online stating that "from March 1, 2026, all videos on Bilibili (B站) will require the purchase of a Bilibili video membership for complete viewing, and basic bullet comment functionality will also be tied to membership benefits," which sparked user attention and discussion. 据新黄河报道，昨日，网络流传一张关于「哔哩哔哩（B 站）自 2026 年 3 月 1 日起，平台所有视频需购买 B 站视频会员方可完整观看，基础弹幕功能同步绑定会员权益开放」的截图，引发用户关注与讨论。

Reporters verified with relevant Bilibili personnel and learned that the aforementioned message is false information. Bilibili stated that it will pursue legal action against rumor-mongers and urged users not to easily believe or spread online rumors. 记者向 B 站有关人士核实获悉，上述消息为不实信息。B 站方面表示，将对造谣者追究法律责任，并呼吁用户切勿轻信和传播网络谣言。

item.title: 聚点新能回应充电桩「暗箱操作」质疑：不存在人为操控
item.guid: 聚点新能回应充电桩「暗箱操作」质疑：不存在人为操控
item.description:
Recently, doubts have emerged online regarding "under-the-table operations" in charging piles, alleging that some manufacturers might manipulate metering for profit, leading to higher charging costs for users and discrepancies in range. This topic quickly gained widespread attention, with car owners in many areas sharing their bills and questioning the reasonableness of the charges. 近日，网络上出现关于充电桩存在「暗箱操作」的质疑，指称部分厂家可能通过人为操控计量牟利，导致用户充电费用偏高、续航里程不符。该话题迅速引发广泛关注，多地车主晒出账单并质疑收费合理性。

Yesterday, charging operator "Judian Xinneng" issued a statement explicitly denying the relevant allegations. 昨天，充电运营商「聚点新能」发布声明，明确否认相关指控。

The company stated that, following a comprehensive internal review, all charging pile equipment strictly complies with national metrology regulations and industry standards, and has been calibrated by statutory metrology testing institutions. There is no human manipulation of metering or illegal profit-making behavior. 公司表示，经内部全面核查，所有充电桩设备均严格遵守国家计量法规及行业规范，并通过法定计量检测机构校准，不存在人为操控计量或违规牟利的行为。

Judian Xinneng also announced that it has launched a nationwide inspection of charging pile equipment, focusing on checking metering accuracy and charging efficiency. It plans to disclose the composition of charges (electricity fees, service fees, etc.) and establish a green channel for user feedback to promptly resolve issues encountered during charging. 聚点新能同时宣布已启动全国范围的充电桩设备巡检，重点排查计量精度与充电效率，并计划公开收费构成（电费、服务费等），建立用户反馈绿色通道，以便及时解决充电过程中出现的问题。

Public information shows that Judian Xinneng has long focused on the research, development, production, and operation of smart charging piles, serving millions of users cumulatively. The company emphasized in its statement that it will continue to adhere to the principles of legality and compliance, welcome public supervision, and prioritize safety and user experience as its core mission. 公开资料显示，聚点新能长期专注智能充电桩研发、生产与运营，累计服务数百万用户。公司在声明中强调，将继续秉持合法合规原则，欢迎社会监督，并以安全与用户体验为核心使命。

item.title: 京东斥资 34.73 亿港元购入中环写字楼 50% 权益，定位自用深化在港供应链
item.guid: 京东斥资-34.73-亿港元购入中环写字楼-50%-权益，定位自用深化在港供应链
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, JD.com, through Jasmine Investment Development IV, acquired a 50% interest in specific parts of a 27-story office building located at 3 Connaught Road Central, Hong Kong. The agreed property value is HKD 3.498 billion, and the transaction price is estimated to be HKD 3.473 billion. 据界面新闻 报道，京东通过 Jasmine Investment Development IV 收购位于香港中环干诺道中 3 号一幢 27 层办公大楼的特定部分 50% 权益，协议物业价值为 34.98 亿港元，交易价格预计为 34.73 亿港元。

The property is an SPL property, and its scope of rights includes the ground floor lobby, parts of the fifth to twenty-sixth floors (total construction area approximately 111,600 square meters), and a total of 18 parking spaces from the first to third basement levels. 该物业为 SPL 物业，权利范围包括一层大堂、第五至第二十六层部分楼层（总建面约 11.16 万平方米）及地下一层至三层共 18 个车位。

JD.com stated that this acquisition is for "self-use" and will continue to invest in the supply chain, promoting the integration of retail, logistics, technology R&D, and other businesses into Hong Kong and serving Hong Kong. 京东方面表示此次收购为「自用」，并将围绕供应链持续投资，推动零售、物流、技术研发等业务融入香港、服务香港。

The transaction is subject to prerequisite conditions such as approval by a special general meeting of shareholders and property transfer, and is expected to be completed in January 2026. The total construction area of the building is approximately 229,200 square meters, excluding parking spaces; payment methods include a deposit into an escrow account and buyer's loan for repayment of seller's related debts, with the remaining balance paid upon completion. 交易需满足股东特别大会批准、物业转让等先决条件，预计将于 2026 年 1 月完成。该大楼总建面约 22.92 万平方米，不含车位；支付方式包括定金入托管户及买方贷款用于偿还卖方相关债务，完成时支付余款。

The timeline compiled by Kuaikeji shows that JD.com's business expansion in Hong Kong has continued for many years: in 2015, it established logistics and e-commerce branches; in 2023, its express delivery in Hong Kong achieved full-process self-operation and optimized collection and transportation processes; in the first quarter of this year, the Hong Kong Island operations center was activated, and during the 618 shopping festival, Hong Kong's transaction volume increased by 104% year-on-year. 快科技梳理的时间线显示，京东对香港的业务铺设已持续多年：2015 年设立物流与电商分支，2023 年在港快递实现全环节自营并优化揽运流程；今年一季度港岛运营中心启用，618 期间香港成交额同比增长 104%。

In terms of offline retail, in August, it acquired local brand "Jiabao" and established an innovative retail business unit; in September, it announced that "JD MALL"'s first store in Hong Kong would open in Wan Chai, expected to commence operations in 2026; in October, its subsidiary obtained a Hong Kong insurance broker license (valid until 2028). 在线下零售方面，8 月收购本地品牌「佳宝」并成立创新零售业务部，9 月宣布「JD MALL」香港首店将落户湾仔，预计 2026 年开业；10 月旗下公司获发香港保险经纪牌照（有效期至 2028 年）。

item.title: 《海绵宝宝：深海大冒险》发布新预告，元旦上映
item.guid: 《海绵宝宝：深海大冒险》发布新预告，元旦上映
item.description:
Paramount Pictures' brand new animated film "SpongeBob SquarePants: The Deep Sea Adventure" officially released its "Brave the Deep Sea" trailer yesterday. 美国派拉蒙影片公司出品的全新动画电影《海绵宝宝：深海大冒险》昨日正式发布「勇闯深海」预告。

The film continues the joyful genes of the classic IP, with SpongeBob and Patrick embarking on an unprecedented deep-sea adventure in the trailer. 影片延续了经典 IP 的欢乐基因，海绵宝宝与派大星在预告片中开启前所未有的深海冒险。

The story opens with SpongeBob excitedly declaring to Patrick on the boat, "It was yesterday, my life is about to change completely!" He then accidentally falls into the mysterious Nether Sea, encountering strange creatures and unknown challenges. Upon learning of the danger, Mr. Krabs, Squidward, and Gary quickly gather and embark on a rescue mission. 故事开场，海绵宝宝在船上激动地对派大星宣告：「就是昨天，我的人生要彻底改变啦！」随后意外坠入神秘幽冥海域，遭遇奇异生物与未知挑战。得知险情后，蟹老板、章鱼哥和小蜗迅速集结，踏上营救之旅。

Since its premiere in 1999, SpongeBob has become a symbol of joy in the growth memories of global audiences. The filmmakers stated that this deep-sea adventure will usher in a new year for audiences with laughter and warmth. 自 1999 年动画开播以来，海绵宝宝已成为全球观众成长记忆中的快乐符号。片方指出，这场深海冒险将以欢笑与温情为观众开启新一年。

item.title: 《EVA》制作公司 GAINAX 宣告解散
item.guid: 《EVA》制作公司-GAINAX-宣告解散
item.description:
According to China.com, GAINAX, the animation production company that produced well-known works such as "Neon Genesis Evangelion," "Gurren Lagann," and "Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water," completed bankruptcy liquidation and cancelled its corporate registration yesterday, officially announcing its dissolution and ending approximately 42 years of history. 据中华网报道，曾制作《新世纪福音战士》《天元突破》《蓝宝石之谜》等知名作品的动画制作公司 GAINAX 已于昨天完成破产清算并注销法人资格，正式宣告解散，结束了约 42 年的历史。

GAINAX was founded in the 1980s by Hideaki Anno, Yasuhiro Takeda, Hiroyuki Yamaga, Yoshiyuki Sadamoto, Shinji Higuchi, and others, becoming one of the most representative independent studios in the Japanese animation industry. GAINAX 成立于 1980 年代，由庵野秀明、武田康广、山贺博之、贞本义行、樋口真嗣等人共同创立，是日本动画产业中最具代表性的独立工作室之一。

The company sparked an anime boom in the 1990s with "Neon Genesis Evangelion," becoming an iconic presence in the industry. However, after entering the 21st century, core talents gradually left, and the company's operations steadily deteriorated. In 2019, the then-president was arrested for a criminal case, and the company fell into paralysis. 该公司凭借《新世纪福音战士》在 1990 年代掀起动画热潮，成为行业标志性存在。然而进入 21 世纪后，核心人才陆续出走，公司经营逐渐恶化。2019 年，时任社长因刑事案件被捕，公司陷入瘫痪。

With the support of Khara Inc., GAINAX attempted to rebuild and sort out its assets and debts, but due to heavy historical debt, it ultimately filed for bankruptcy in May 2024. 在株式会社 Khara 的支持下，GAINAX 曾尝试重建并理清资产与债务，但因历史债务过重，最终于 2024 年 5 月申请破产。

Hideaki Anno, as CEO of Khara, released a statement on the official website yesterday, confirming the completion of bankruptcy proceedings and criticizing the improper conduct of the former management. 庵野秀明作为 Khara CEO，于昨天在官网发布声明，确认破产整理完成，并对旧经营层的不当行为提出批评。

He pointed out that the former management had carried out illegitimate transfers of rights and data, leading the company to file a civil lawsuit and reach a settlement in January 2023. 他指出，旧管理层曾进行缺乏正当性的权利转让与资料移交，公司因此提起民事诉讼并于 2023 年 1 月达成和解。

Anno emphasized in the statement that the copyrights and data of related works have been returned to the rights holders and creators through proper procedures to prevent loss. He specifically thanked the last president, Yasuhiro Kamimura, for his full efforts to prevent data loss and complete the handover during the company's final stage, saying, "Kamimura, thank you. You worked hard." 庵野在声明中强调，相关作品的版权与资料已通过正当程序返还至权利人及创作者，避免散佚。他特别感谢最后一任社长神村靖宏在公司终结阶段全力防止资料流失并完成交接，称「神村，谢谢你。辛苦了」。

With the completion of the liquidation, GAINAX's history officially comes to an end. Its trademark has been transferred to Khara for management, and the copyright for the "EVA" series was already transferred in 2006 when Anno established Khara. Therefore, this bankruptcy will not affect the subsequent operation of the "EVA" IP. 随着清算完成，GAINAX 的历史正式画上句号。其商标已转移至 Khara 管理，《EVA》系列版权早在 2006 年庵野成立 Khara 时已完成转移，因此本次破产不会影响《EVA》IP 的后续运营。

item.title: 索尼推进《惊变 28 年》第三部：墨菲回归、加兰执笔
item.guid: 索尼推进《惊变-28-年》第三部：墨菲回归、加兰执笔
item.description:
According to Deadline, Sony is moving forward with the third installment of the zombie horror film series "28 Years Later." Cillian Murphy, who starred in the previous film "28 Days Later," is in talks to return, and Alex Garland is writing the script. 据 Deadline 报道，索尼正推进丧尸恐怖片《惊变 28 年》系列第三部。前作《惊变 28 天》主演基里安 · 墨菲已就回归出演进行商谈，亚历克斯 · 加兰正在撰写剧本。

The first "28 Years Later" film opened in North America in June this year, with a $30 million opening weekend, making it one of the highest horror film openings this year. It subsequently accumulated $70.4 million in North America and $151.3 million globally, setting a new record for the series. 《28 年》第一部今年 6 月开启北美上映，首周末 3000 万美元创今年恐怖片高开之一，后续北美累计 7040 万美元、全球 1.513 亿美元，刷新该系列最高纪录。

The plot of "28 Years Later" is set 28 years after a viral apocalypse, where survivors establish a relatively peaceful community on a Scottish holy island, led by Jamie and his son Spike. However, the peace is shattered by the emergence of more ferocious mutated infected, and the father and son are hunted while venturing out to forage. 《惊变 28 年》剧情设定在病毒浩劫 28 年后，幸存者在苏格兰圣岛建立起相对和平的社群，由杰米和他儿子斯派克带领，但平静被打破，出现更凶猛的变异感染者，父子冒险外出觅食时遭遇追杀。
